data.name: Commercial Loan - Res Secured
data.description: Our Commercial Loan is ideal if you want to secure financing to grow the business operations, start new business ventures, maintain existing operating cashflow while expanding your business or funding for major projects.

features.additionalInfo: Payments can be arranged weekly, fortnightly or monthly.
Fixed or Variable interest rates are available providing flexibility to tailor the loan to your business needs.
Borrow as little as $10,000 for business purposes with an ability to redraw extra payments.

eligibility.additionalValue: Loans are available to members of the bank who are permanent residents of Australia and currently live in Australia

fees.name: Other Credit Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure for information on other fees and charges which may apply.

fees.name: Valuation Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Valuation Fee may be charged at time of application, the fee is payable where a valuation is required to be ordered in respect to mortgaged properties to Queensland Country Bank. A third party may be engaged to complete the valuation and their fee will be disclosed on application.

fees.name: Additional Establishment Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Government Fees - Company Search, Title Search Fee and DNRM Registration Fees and External Document Preparation Fee.  Government Fees include Company Search, Title Search and Department of Natural Resources Management Fees. These fees may be charged at time of application, the fee relates to information or registration obtained from various government regulatory bodies and preparation of documents from external third parties in relation to the loan/facility.

fees.name: Lenders Mortgage Insurance - LMI
fees.additionalInfo: LMI Fee may be charged at time of application, the fee is payable where the maximum loan amount exceeds the relevant loan to valuation percentage as determined by Queensland Country Bank. A third party is engaged to issue this insurance and their fee will be disclosed on application.

fees.name: Facility Review Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Facility Review Fee is charged at time of annual review. Cost is dependent on complexity of the facility.
